006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * Represents constraint metadata that is common to all constraints.
012 */
013public interface IConfigurableMessageConstraintBase extends IConstraintBase {
014  /**
015   * Get a custom message to use when the constraint is not satisfied.
016   * <p>
017   * A custom message allow for more meaningful information, tailored to the test
018   * case, to be provided in the case a constraint is not satisfied.
019   *
020   * @return the message or {@code null} if a default message is to be used
021   */
022  @Nullable
023  String getMessage();
024}
